text: GNK Dinamo Zagreb is a football club which plays in Croatia. == Name == * 1911-1945 1. HŠK Građanski *1945-1991 Dinamo Zagreb * 1991-1992 HAŠK-Građanski * 1992-2000 Croatia Zagreb * 2000-2011 Dinamo Zagreb *2011-present GNK Dinamo Zagreb == League titles == * Yugoslav First League : 4 ** 1947/48, 1953/54, 1957/58, 1981/82 * Prva HNL : 24 ** 1992/93, 1995/96, 1996/97, 1997/98, 1998/99, 1999/00, 2002/03, 2005/06, 2006/07, 2007/08, 2008/09, 2009/10, 2010/11, 2011/12, 2012/13, 2013/14, 2014/15, 2015/16, 2017/18, 2018/19, 2019/20, 2020/21, 2021/22, 2022/23 == League position == Season League Position 1992 Prva HNL 5th 1992/93 Prva HNL Champions 1993/94 Prva HNL 3rd 1994/95 Prva HNL 2nd 1995/96 Prva HNL Champions 1996/97 Prva HNL Champions 1997/98 Prva HNL Champions 1998/99 Prva HNL Champions 1999/00 Prva HNL Champions 2000/01 Prva HNL 2nd 2001/02 Prva HNL 3rd 2002/03 Prva HNL Champions 2003/04 Prva HNL 2nd 2004/05 Prva HNL 7th 2005/06 Prva HNL Champions 2006/07 Prva HNL Champions 2007/08 Prva HNL Champions 2008/09 Prva HNL Champions 2009/10 Prva HNL Champions 2010/11 Prva HNL Champions 2011/12 Prva HNL Champions 2012/13 Prva HNL Champions 2013/14 Prva HNL Champions 2014/15 Prva HNL Champions 2015/16 Prva HNL Champions 2016/17 Prva HNL 2nd 2017/18 Prva HNL Champions 2018/19 Prva HNL Champions 2019/20 Prva HNL Champions 2020/21 Prva HNL Champions Category:20th-century establishments in Croatia Category:1945 establishments in Europe Category:Croatian football clubs Category:Organizations based in Zagreb
